short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add, remove, or modify HTTP Headers for any request based on a regular expression

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick way to modify the headers for HTTP requests.

- Regular expression based URL matching
- Add arbitrary headers
- Remove arbitrary headers
- Immediate updating
